alert.note: Alert for Morton; Stanton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 8:21PM CDT until June 03 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Morton County in southwestern Kansas... Southwestern Stanton County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 820 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Walsh to 6 miles southeast of Stonington to 9 miles west of Elkhart, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elkhart, The Saunders Elevator, Richfield, Manter and Wilburton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
